Name: Narisensio
description:
Narisensio, a resident of Rubirizi, Kagadi district is married with 4 children. He is a commercial farmer growing cocoa, coffee and matooke.

Narisensio is a repeat borrower and is now requesting a loan to help him purchase farm inputs so he can boost crop yields and quality. He will be able to sell his good quality harvests at profitable prices. Thank you, funders.
